item.title: Brad Lander Would Declare Housing Emergency if Elected N.Y.C. Mayor
item.description: Mr. Lander wants 500,000 homes to be built in the city. Nearly every candidate has the crisis as a top issue.

item.title: Juan Hamilton, Georgia O’Keeffe’s Companion and Contested Heir, Dies at 79
item.description: As a young potter, he turned up on the doorstep of an octogenarian master of modern painting. They grew so close it became a scandal.

item.title: Over a Dozen Conservative Party Donors Fund Nigel Farage’s Reform U.K.

item.title: Some Schools Rethink “College For All”
item.description: The idea that every student should aim for a four-year college motivated a bipartisan movement for decades. Now even enthusiastic promoters of the ide...

item.title: Who Paid for Trump’s Transition to Power? The Donors Are Still Unknown.
item.description: President Trump has not made good on a promise to disclose who contributed to his transition effort.
